CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid CDE => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the cardholder data environment to the external internet in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 1.3.3, 1.3.5, & 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid DMZ => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the demilitarized zone to the internal network in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 1.3.3, 1.3.4, & 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internet => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the external internet to all internal environments in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 1.2.3.b, 1.3.1, 1.3.2, & 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internet => CDE Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the external internet to the cardholder data environment in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 1.3.3, 1.3.5, & 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internet => DMZ Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the external internet to the demilitarized zone in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 1.3.3, 1.3.4, & 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internal => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the internal environment to the external internet in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 2.2.2.a-b, 2.3.b, & 4.1.c,f

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internal => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the internal environment to the internal environment in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 2.2.2.a-b, 2.3.b, & 4.1.c,f

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Test => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the test environment to other internal environments in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-c, 2.2.2.a-b, 6.4.1.a-b, 6.4.2

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Test => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the test environment to the external internet in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 1.2.1.a-b, 2.2.2.a-b, 6.4.1, 6.4.2

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Wireless => CDE Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the wireless environment to the internal card holder data environment in supplemental support of PCI-DSS Controls: 2.2.2.a-b

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : ESP Allowed Ingress Comm Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on allowed ingress network communication to the ESP (electronic security perimeter).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : ESP Allowed Egress Comm Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on allowed egress network communication to the ESP (electronic security perimeter).

AIE: NERC-CIP: ESP Network Allowed Egress Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on allowed egress network communication to the ESP (electronic security perimeter).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP: ESP Network Allowed Ingress Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on allowed ingress network communication to the ESP (electronic security perimeter).

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid CDE => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the cardholder data environment to the external internet.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid DMZ => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the demilitarized zone to the internal network.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internet => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the external internet to all internal environments.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internet => CDE Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the external internet to the cardholder data environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internet => DMZ Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the external internet to the demilitarized zone.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internal => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the internal environment to the external internet.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Internal => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the internal environment to the internal environment.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Test => Internal Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the test environment to other internal environments.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Test => Internet Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the test environment to the external internet.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: PCI-DSS: Invalid Wireless => CDE Comm
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule creates events for un-allowed communication from the wireless environment to the internal card holder data environment.
